channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Fathers Trigilio and Brighenti answer viewer emails on how to live a Christian life, mental challenges, in-vitro fertilization, how many Masses priests may say daily, receiving Communion by name, and cremation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: During a time of great division, Robert Bellarmine defended Church teaching against the revolutionary ideas of the Protestant Reformers. His scriptural and theological acumen made him a giant among doctors of the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik
channel.desc: The Miracle Hunter investigates the canonization cause of Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik, a Polish immigrant who founded her own order of nuns to care for the poor, elderly and abandoned. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc:
Christopher O?Keefe's faith journey led him to give his life to God in service, working in prison ministry, and eventually becoming an ordained pastor in the Mennonite tradition.
However, his desire to find a solid and stable apostolic authority, as well as a doctrine that would not change to accommodate cultural norms, led him to find a home in the Catholic Church. He entered into full communion at the Easter Vigil in 2022. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Palestine : Quand Le Fils De L'homme Vient
channel.desc: La bande de Gaza est longue de 41 km et large de 10 km, bord?e par la mer M?diterran?e, Isra?l et l'?gypte. Elle est aujourd'hui dirig?e par le groupe islamiste militant Hamas. Lorsque le Hamas a pris le pouvoir ? Gaza, Isra?l et l'?gypte ont impos? un blocus sur le territoire, qui h?berge 2 millions de personnes. Plus de 40 % ont moins de 15 ans et le ch?mage des jeunes s'?l?ve ? plus de 60 %. Certains qualifient la bande de Gaza comme la plus grande prison au monde. Le documentaire se penche sur les r?alit?s de Gaza aujourd'hui ? et le r?le vital de la minorit? chr?tienne au service de son prochain. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: As Catholics, we believe that the Blessed Virgin is Queen of Heaven and Earth. Susan Conroy shows how many of the saints approached instead as a mother. Mary is indeed our mother, wanting all the best for us until we are brought safely home to heaven. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Honduras Avant Qu?ils Ne Partent
channel.desc: Le Honduras est l'un des pays les plus pauvres d'Am?rique centrale et l'un des endroits les plus violents au monde. La combinaison de la pauvret? et de l'attrait du profit dans le commerce omnipr?sent de la drogue a fait de nombreuses victimes. ? ce jour, le gouvernement n'a pas ?t? en mesure de r?duire la pauvret? ou d'endiguer le trafic de drogue et la violence des gangs qui en r?sulte. L'?glise catholique est l'une des rares institutions du pays ? offrir des soins et des alternatives sociales aux jeunes familles. Ce film examine certains des d?fis ainsi que les programmes g?r?s par l'?glise. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Marion Carroll suffered from MS for 17 years, and was bedridden and incontinent. But on September 3, 1989, she was healed at Knock, Ireland?s shrine. In this interview, she recalls what happened on that special day. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc:
Christopher O?Keefe's faith journey led him to give his life to God in service, working in prison ministry, and eventually becoming an ordained pastor in the Mennonite tradition.
However, his desire to find a solid and stable apostolic authority, as well as a doctrine that would not change to accommodate cultural norms, led him to find a home in the Catholic Church. He entered into full communion at the Easter Vigil in 2022. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Conversation
channel.desc: Helena O?Shea speaks about the Youth 2000 movement dedicated to the devotion of the Blessed Sacrament, Our Lady through the Rosary, and faithfulness to the Church teachings. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: As King Henry VIII sinks into tyranny, he eliminates the last obstacle to his state Church, the monasteries, seizing their lands and wealth, and putting down the rebellion known as the Pilgrimage of Grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill travels to Paris where the Virgin Mary appeared to St. Catherine Laboure in 1830, resulting in the most famous and widespread Catholic medal in circulation, the Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris Stefanick learns to surf while visiting the perfect beaches of Kauai, where the people, culture, and strong sense of family make for a heavenly experience. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed James Kern and his fervent love of the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the greatness of St. Anthony. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: What's wrong with saying: "It's my body so I can do what I like with it."? An exploration of the issues of suicide, abortion, euthanasia and human happiness, and how they relate to end of life decisions. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Fr. Wade and co-host Tom Nash reveal how when a priest pronounces the words of consecration, what looks like bread is no longer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch discusses the drunkards of Ephraim and Judah, their destruction by Assyria and the salvation of the Lord ?on that day? for the remnant of survivors who fled to Jerusalem. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan welcomes San Diego Padres pitcher Joe Wieland as he shares in-depth his great love for the Eucharist and how his Catholic faith helps him through difficulties. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Franciscan University Presents
channel.desc: Fr. Carter Griffin explores Catholic family life and shares practical ideas for how to guide children to sainthood. Fr. Dave Pivonka, Dr. Scott Hahn and Dr. Regis Martin join. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: After an instantaneous and miraculous healing while a young religious, Sister Briege McKenna was given the gift of healing. Learn more about this amazing charism of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. continues his series on Catholic teachings and how they are rooted in the Bible and the beliefs of the Early Church with a look at what the early Christians believed the Eucharist to be. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Niccol? Machiavelli and St. Francis of Assisi?s discussion on religion, politics, and morality prompts the Political Theorist and Saint to bear witness a miracle. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: Two more detectives join the case. As the team ponders the death of Mr. Faith, the truth comes to light, and Dorothy finds the answers she needs to continue into the next world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains the importance of the seven Sacraments as the only guaranteed way that we receive grace needed for salvation. Also, get to know the Heart of Mary House Hospice. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Groeschel talks about the virtue of Justice. He talks about what the moral virtue of justice is. It seems that God having any rights is lost. He also talks about what justice is in this country and how we have had injustice. He uses scripture to point out references to justice in the Bible. He talks about it as being giving everyone what their due is including God. He also talks about what happens when we lose tract of the supernatural virtue of Justice. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the Parable of the Good Samaritan as the motivation for a philosophy of life for a Christian. Seen from the perspective of how we use God's gifts, we are called to help others on our path - not ignore them. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Discover the significance of Pope Leo XIV taking possession of the major papal basilicas, explore the roots of the Church?s first American pope, and, follow the pilgrims of the Papal Foundation walking through Rome in faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Conversation
channel.desc: Helena O?Shea speaks about the Youth 2000 movement dedicated to the devotion of the Blessed Sacrament, Our Lady through the Rosary, and faithfulness to the Church teachings. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Elisabeth Hesselblad
channel.desc: The early life of Elisabeth Hesselblad, a convert to the Catholic faith, who became the first Swedish saint in modern times. She founded a new order with many convents worldwide. (40 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Unsolvable Problem
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Andy and her lovable convent of sisters encounter a dilemma as they plan a patriotic picnic for the poor. The kids learn about convent life, prayers to Jesus and how to handle life?s problems, big and small. (20 minutes).

channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug prepares Italian cuisine while discussing the importance of family togetherness and how we can all look to our Mother Church. (30 minutes).

channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Forgive, With Immacul?e Ilibagiza
channel.desc: Discover the journey to forgiveness of Danny and Leila Abdallah. Three of their children were among a group walking to get ice cream, when they were struck and killed by a drunk driver. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the greatness of St. Anthony. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Delve into the mystery of Incarnation as Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark journey to sites throughout Bethlehem for an unforgettable Christmas experience. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the influence of the monastic life on the spirituality of the Church in general, led by Ss. Augustine, Anthony of Egypt, Basil, Martin of Tours, Benedict and Columba. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Speaking from the heart, Mother Angelica shares some inspired insights about the kingdom of God. In today?s lesson, she compares the kingdom to a buried treasure of immeasurable wealth, and discusses the law of love. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord take a closer look at the miraculous conversion of Spanish soldier St. Ignatius of Loyola, and how it led to him founding The Society of Jesus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Ryan Penny and his panel of influencers discuss the ways humor can draw people closer to their faith in a world that desperately needs the Good News and a good laugh. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Good Or Evil: Who Decides?
channel.desc: In our culture many find no need for celibacy in the single life, in priesthood or even in marriage. Apologist and author Dr. Raymond De Souza explains celibacy and what it means for people, whatever their calling in life may be. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 12 - INCARNATION AND MARY'S "YES"DEFEATS SIN, SATAN AND DEATH. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan invites NFL wide receiver Chris Horn to discuss how his Catholic faith played a large role in his career and how his faith remains front-and-center in his life after football. (30 minutes).

Christopher O?Keefe's faith journey led him to give his life to God in service, working in prison ministry, and eventually becoming an ordained pastor in the Mennonite tradition.

channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Patti Mansfield presents St. Elena Guerra, an apostle of the Holy Spirit, and shares the saint?s call to write Pope Leo XIII and encourage Catholics to live a perennial Pentecost. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: From an early age, children learn their prayers by heart. But prayer also invites us into a relationship with God. Jesus taught the Disciples how to pray the Our Father, which embodies His will for His children. (15 minutes).

channel.desc: When the friends attend a camp, they soon begin to miss the comforts of their home. Inspired by the heroic life of St. Maximilian Kolbe, Lukas helps them understand they should always be grateful for what they have. (15 minutes).

channel.desc: La bande de Gaza est longue de 41 km et large de 10 km, bord?e par la mer M?diterran?e, Isra?l et l'?gypte. Elle est aujourd'hui dirig?e par le groupe islamiste militant Hamas. Lorsque le Hamas a pris le pouvoir ? Gaza, Isra?l et l'?gypte ont impos? un blocus sur le territoire, qui h?berge 2 millions de personnes. Plus de 40 % ont moins de 15 ans et le ch?mage des jeunes s'?l?ve ? plus de 60 %. Certains qualifient la bande de Gaza comme la plus grande prison au monde. Le documentaire se penche sur les r?alit?s de Gaza aujourd'hui ? et le r?le vital de la minorit? chr?tienne au service de son prochain. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains the importance of the seven Sacraments as the only guaranteed way that we receive grace needed for salvation. Also, get to know the Heart of Mary House Hospice. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik
channel.desc: The Miracle Hunter investigates the canonization cause of Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik, a Polish immigrant who founded her own order of nuns to care for the poor, elderly and abandoned. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about seeking justice while admitting personal need for mercy, whether Catholics accept the Septuagint, and how sacraments are efficacious. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Speed Skater Bonnie Blair joins host Bob Dolan to talk about her career, which included winning four gold Olympic medals and about her faith and her volunteer work for Catholic Relief Services. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica adds her insight into the topic of virtue, and all the joys it brings with it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Joshua Mazrin joins to share a lesser-known aspect of a modern day saint, St. Maximilian Kolbe - his deep love and theology for the Blessed Mother, whom he called The Immaculata. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna visits London Bridge, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and where the ancient church of St. Mary Overie stood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Holocaust Symphony No. 3
channel.desc: World-renowned pianist and composer Richard Nanes performs a powerful meditation of the Holocaust. Martin Bookspan delivers a commentary. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: The expression of love through hearing, vision, and touch, and how to relate these to all aspects of our spiritual growth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill travels to Paris where the Virgin Mary appeared to St. Catherine Laboure in 1830, resulting in the most famous and widespread Catholic medal in circulation, the Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Conversation
channel.desc: Tony Foy speaks about the work of NET Ministries which invites young people from around the world to train and serve as missionary teams in parishes and schools across Ireland. (30 minutes).
